title: How to Look for Videos on Facebook: A Complete Guide

steps.title: Open the Facebook app.
steps.content: Open the Facebook app. If you're not automatically logged in, enter your email address and password.

steps.title: Tap the search bar.
steps.content: Tap the search bar. It is at the top of the screen.

steps.title: Type in search terms.
steps.content: Type in search terms. Add information to help find the types of videos you're looking for. If you're looking for videos of a specific person, type in the person's name. For a specific subject, type the subject -- orangutans, for example -- into the search bar.

steps.title: Tap Search.
steps.content: Tap Search . It's the blue button in the lower right of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Videos.
steps.content: Tap Videos . It's a tab near the top of the Facebook window. This will display a list of videos based on your search.

steps.title: Open the Facebook app.
steps.content: Open the Facebook app. If you're not automatically logged in, enter your email address and password.

steps.title: Tap the search bar.
steps.content: Tap the search bar. It is at the top of the screen.

steps.title: Type in the name of the person you're looking for.
steps.content: Type in the name of the person you're looking for.

steps.title: Tap the person's name.
steps.content: Tap the person's name. It should be listed in the search results.

steps.title: Tap Photos.
steps.content: Tap Photos . It's below the person's profile picture.

steps.title: Tap Albums.
steps.content: Tap Albums .

steps.title: Tap Videos.
steps.content: Tap Videos . All of the person's videos, that are visible to you, will be displayed here. Sometimes the privacy setting on a video may prevent you from seeing it.

steps.title: Go to Facebook.com.
steps.content: Go to Facebook.com . If you're not automatically logged in, enter your email address and password.

steps.title: Type in search terms.
steps.content: Type in search terms. Add information to help find the types of videos you're looking for. If you're looking for videos of a specific person, type in the person's name. For a specific subject, type the subject -- sharks, for example -- into the search bar.

steps.title: Click on Search.
steps.content: Click on Search . It's the blue magnifying glass icon to the right of the search bar. This will display a list of videos based on your search.

steps.title: Click on Videos.
